author: siladu
content:
Besu with BONSAI enabled has implicit state pruning (without any additional I/O impact) https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/public-networks/concepts/data-storage-formats/#bonsai-tries 

Coupled with sync-mode=X_CHECKPOINT, total initial disk footprint for mainnet is ~400-500GB, but it grows ~8GB per week because the block data isn't pruned (yet).
